hooks.command: if [[ "$file_path" =~ \.(js|jsx|json|css)$ ]]; then npx prettier --write "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
if [[ "$file_path" =~ \.(js|jsx)$ ]]; then npm run lint -- "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
if [[ "$file_path" =~ (package-lock\.json|node_modules/|\.git/|yarn\.lock) ]]; then echo "⚠️  Blocked: Cannot modify $file_path" >&2; exit 2; fi
osascript -e 'display notification "Awaiting your input" with title "Claude Code"' 2>/dev/null || true
osascript -e 'display notification "Task completed" with title "Claude Code"' 2>/dev/null || true
